about_the_game:
GET YOUR BODY BACK


You are a former pirate king who was defeated in a battle with the sea devil. Waking up in the “Endless Bay” you will find the power that will allow you to take revenge and regain control of the sea for yourself.
Become a vengeful spirit, inhabit enemy ships, use an immortal crew, learn deadly spells to set your own rules of the game in this sea!

BATTLES ON THE HIGH SEAS


Knock down the sails and board? Hole the hull and drown it? Perhaps you want to curse the team, instill panic in them, or capture their souls? Everything is possible in the world Bottle of Ghouls!


EXCHANGING SOULS FOR NEW ABILITIES


A powerful patron will allow you to gain abilities that provide a turning point during the battle! But in exchange for, he will ask more souls.


RANDOM EVENTS AND A UNIQUE JOURNEY


The Roguelike elements will not let you get bored. New enemies, new allies, powerful spells and mountains of gold!


ASSEMBLE THE COMMAND


Your team is a crowd of ghouls and the dead! Upgrade your skills, collect artifacts and conquer this world!

What awaits you beyond the horizon?

short_description: RogueLike pirate battles! You are a necromancer spirit who uses your powers to restore your former glory and greatness. Move into enemy ships, board them, use an immortal crew, plunder, destroy and dominate in Bottle of Ghoul.
